companyProfile.about: A global leader in next-generation digital services and consulting, enabling clients in more than 50 countries to navigate their digital transformation.

A leading global technology company, offering an integrated portfolio of products, solutions and services through its three business units: IT and Business Services, Engineering and R&D Services, and Products & Platforms.
India's largest private sector bank by assets and market capitalization, offering a wide range of banking and financial services to retail and corporate customers.
A leading private sector bank in India offering a wide range of banking products and financial services for corporate and retail customers through various delivery channels.
India's largest public sector bank and a Fortune 500 company, providing a comprehensive range of banking and financial services across the country and internationally.
India's largest pharmaceutical company and a global specialty generic company with a presence in over 100 countries, focused on complex generics and specialty products.
A leading manufacturer of active pharmaceutical ingredients (APIs) and intermediates, with a focus on custom synthesis for innovator pharmaceutical companies globally.

A major Indian pharmaceutical company with a strong presence in therapeutic areas like cardiovascular, central nervous system, gastrointestinal, and anti-diabetics, both in domestic and international markets.
India's largest power generation company, contributing about 25% of the country's total power generation, with a diversified portfolio of thermal, hydro, solar, and wind power plants.
India's largest private thermal power producer, operating a diversified portfolio of power plants across multiple states and supplying electricity to central and state utilities.

companyName: Power Grid Corporation of India Limited

companyProfile.about: A 'Maharatna' Central Public Sector Enterprise and India's principal electric power transmission company, operating about 98% of India's inter-state and inter-regional electric power transmission network.
India's largest passenger vehicle manufacturer, commanding over 40% market share, offering a wide range of cars across segments with a strong sales and service network.
A leading Indian multinational automotive manufacturing corporation and part of the Mahindra Group, with a strong presence in utility vehicles, farm equipment, and financial services.
The world's third-largest manufacturer of motorcycles and the largest manufacturer of three-wheelers, with a strong export footprint across 70+ countries.

A 'Navratna' Central Public Sector Enterprise and India's leading defence electronics company, manufacturing advanced electronic products and systems for the Indian Armed Forces and other strategic sectors.

A 'Navratna' Central Public Sector Enterprise and India's premier aerospace and defence company, engaged in the design, development, manufacture, repair, and overhaul of aircraft, helicopters, engines, and related systems.

India's largest engineering and construction conglomerate, with diversified businesses in technology, engineering, construction, manufacturing, and financial services, executing complex projects globally.
A leading global telecommunications company with operations in 18 countries across Asia and Africa, offering integrated voice, data, enterprise, digital TV, and mobile financial services.
A major telecom operator in India providing pan-India voice and data services across 2G, 3G, and 4G platforms, formed by the merger of Vodafone India and Idea Cellular.
One of the world's largest telecom tower infrastructure providers, offering passive infrastructure services to major telecom operators across India with a portfolio of over 200,000 towers.
India's leading integrated steel manufacturer with a global footprint, producing a diversified range of steel products and operating one of the largest single-location steel plants in the country.
A diversified global natural resources company with operations in oil & gas, zinc, lead, silver, copper, iron ore, steel, aluminum, and power across India, South Africa, Namibia, and Australia.
India's largest and the world's second-largest integrated zinc-lead producer, operating world-class zinc-lead mines and smelters with a significant market share in the domestic zinc industry.

A 'Mini-Ratna' Central Public Sector Enterprise under the Ministry of Railways, undertaking rail infrastructure projects including doubling, gauge conversion, new lines, and railway electrification across India.

A 'Navratna' Central Public Sector Enterprise under the Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs, providing project management consultancy, engineering, procurement, and construction services primarily for government projects.
India's leading integrated highways infrastructure developer, operating one of the largest portfolios of Build-Operate-Transfer (BOT) projects in the roads and highways sector.

One of the largest franchise bottlers of PepsiCo beverages in the world, operating in India and several other countries, producing and distributing carbonated soft drinks and non-carbonated beverages.
One of India's leading food companies with a strong portfolio of biscuits, bread, cakes, rusks, and dairy products, known for iconic brands like Good Day, Marie, and Bourbon.
A leading Indian fast-moving consumer goods company with a significant presence in household insecticides, air care, hair care, and personal wash categories across India and international markets.

India's largest spirits company and a subsidiary of Diageo, with a wide portfolio of alcoholic beverages including whisky, brandy, rum, vodka, gin, and wine under popular brands like McDowell's, Signature, and Royal Challenge.
A leading global information technology, consulting, and business process services company, offering comprehensive IT solutions and services across multiple industry verticals.
A global technology consulting and digital solutions company formed by the merger of Larsen & Toubro Infotech and Mindtree, serving clients across multiple industry sectors.
A leading provider of digital transformation, consulting, and business reengineering services and solutions, with a strong focus on the communications, media, and entertainment sectors.
A global software services company specializing in software product development, digital engineering, and enterprise modernization, serving technology companies and large enterprises.
A leading Indian private sector bank offering a wide range of banking and financial services including retail banking, corporate banking, investment banking, and wealth management.
One of India's largest private sector banks, offering a comprehensive suite of financial services including retail banking, corporate banking, treasury, and international banking.
India's third-largest public sector bank with a strong domestic and international presence, offering a wide range of banking products and financial services to retail and corporate customers.
A global pharmaceutical company focused on developing and manufacturing affordable, high-quality medicines, with strong capabilities in respiratory, anti-retroviral, urology, and cardiology segments.
An integrated global pharmaceutical company engaged in the development, manufacturing, and marketing of a wide range of generic and branded pharmaceutical products across therapeutic areas.

A research-based global pharmaceutical company that develops, manufactures, and markets a broad range of formulations, biopharmaceuticals, and active pharmaceutical ingredients across therapeutic areas.
A multinational pharmaceutical company developing and marketing a wide range of branded and generic formulations, biotechnology products, and active pharmaceutical ingredients globally.

India's largest private sector company with diversified businesses across energy (refining, petrochemicals), retail, digital services, and new energy, operating the world's largest refining complex at Jamnagar.
India's largest government-owned oil and gas exploration and production company, contributing about 70% of India's domestic production of crude oil and around 85% of natural gas.
One of the largest renewable energy companies in India, developing, building, owning, and operating utility-scale grid-connected solar, wind, and hybrid renewable power plants.
India's largest integrated power company with a diversified portfolio across generation (thermal, hydro, solar, wind), transmission, distribution, and renewable energy solutions.

A leading global automobile manufacturer with a portfolio spanning passenger vehicles, trucks, buses, and defence vehicles, and a strong presence in electric vehicles through its subsidiary, Tata Passenger Electric Mobility.
Manufacturer of the iconic Royal Enfield motorcycles and a leading player in the commercial vehicles segment through its joint venture with Volvo (VE Commercial Vehicles).
One of India's leading two-wheeler and three-wheeler manufacturers, with a strong product portfolio across motorcycles, scooters, mopeds, and electric vehicles, and a growing international presence.
A leading technology company in electrification and automation, providing a wide range of products, systems, and solutions for utilities, industries, and infrastructure.
A leading technology company focused on the areas of automation, digitalization, electrification, and mobility, providing products, systems, and solutions for industry and infrastructure.

companyName: CG Power and Industrial Solutions Limited

companyProfile.about: A global leader in management of electricity, offering products, systems, and services for power generation, transmission, distribution, and industrial applications, with a strong presence in over 80 countries.
A telecommunications service provider offering mobile, fixed-line, and broadband services in the Rajasthan and North East telecommunication circles, operating as a subsidiary of Bharti Airtel.
A global digital infrastructure provider offering integrated portfolio of services including connectivity, collaboration, cloud, security, and media services to enterprises and carriers worldwide.

A leading technology company specializing in the design, development, and manufacturing of high-end telecommunications equipment and optical fiber cables, serving telecom service providers and infrastructure developers.
One of the world's most geographically diversified steel producers, with operations and commercial presence across Europe, Asia, and India, producing a wide range of steel products.
The metals flagship company of the Aditya Birla Group and a global leader in aluminum and copper, with operations spanning from bauxite mining to downstream value-added products.
A Maharatna public sector undertaking and the world's largest coal mining company, responsible for over 80% of India's coal production, operating through numerous subsidiaries across the country.

A leading highway and infrastructure development company in India, engaged in the construction of roads, highways, bridges, and irrigation projects, with a strong presence in Southern and Western India.
A leading global engineering, procurement, and construction company specializing in power transmission and distribution, oil and gas pipelines, railways, and civil infrastructure projects.
A leading infrastructure development and engineering company in India, primarily focused on the construction of roads, highways, bridges, and other transportation infrastructure projects.
A subsidiary of Oracle Corporation, providing IT solutions and services to the global financial services industry, including banking, insurance, and capital markets.
A global IT solutions and services provider offering digital services, consulting, and technology solutions across industries including travel, insurance, banking, and healthcare.

An IT solutions provider specializing in cloud and cognitive services, infrastructure solutions, and business process outsourcing, serving clients across financial services, technology, and communications sectors.
A major public sector bank in India providing a wide range of banking and financial services to retail and corporate customers, with a large branch network across the country.
One of the largest public sector banks in India, offering a comprehensive range of banking and financial services through its extensive branch and ATM network across the country.
A leading private sector bank in India offering a wide range of banking products and financial services to consumer and corporate customers, with a focus on vehicle finance and retail banking.
A leading Indian pharmaceutical company engaged in the development, manufacture, and sale of pharmaceutical and nutraceutical products, with a strong presence in acute therapy segments.
A globally recognized biopharmaceutical company developing and commercializing novel biologics, biosimilars, and complex small molecule APIs across diabetes, oncology, and immunology.
A subsidiary of Abbott Laboratories, USA, engaged in the development, manufacture, and marketing of pharmaceutical, diagnostic, and nutritional products across various therapeutic areas.
India's largest government-owned oil and gas company, engaged in refining, pipeline transportation, marketing of petroleum products, and exploration and production of crude oil and gas.
A Maharatna public sector undertaking and one of India's leading oil refining and marketing companies, operating refineries, marketing petroleum products, and expanding into renewable energy.
India's leading natural gas company with integrated operations across gas transmission, marketing, processing, distribution, and petrochemicals, operating the country's largest pipeline network.
The world's largest manufacturer of motorcycles and scooters by volume, with a dominant market share in India's two-wheeler segment and a growing global presence.
India's second-largest manufacturer of commercial vehicles, producing a wide range of trucks, buses, and defense vehicles, with a growing presence in international markets.
A leading supplier of technology and services in the areas of mobility solutions, industrial technology, consumer goods, and energy and building technology in India.
The flagship company of the Adani Group, focused on developing new businesses in sectors including airports, roads, data centers, solar manufacturing, and defense.
An energy and environment solutions provider offering a range of products and services in heating, cooling, power, water, and waste management for industrial and commercial clients.
A leading fast-moving electrical goods company manufacturing and selling a wide range of electrical and consumer durable products including switches, cables, lighting, fans, and appliances.
A leading manufacturer of optical, broadband, and data networking products, providing end-to-end solutions to telecom service providers, utilities, and government organizations.
A global technology company that designs, builds, and manages digital networks, offering optical fiber, cables, and network solutions to telecom, cloud, and enterprise customers.

A Mini-Ratna public sector undertaking under the Ministry of Railways, providing telecom and IT infrastructure services, including nationwide optical fiber network, data centers, and railway communication systems.
A Navratna public sector enterprise and India's largest iron ore producer, operating highly mechanized iron ore mines and involved in exploration of minerals like iron ore, copper, and diamonds.
An integrated metal and energy company engaged in iron ore mining, sponge iron manufacturing, and power generation, operating one of India's largest iron ore mines in Maharashtra.
A Maharatna public sector undertaking and India's largest steel producer, operating integrated steel plants and producing a wide range of steel products for domestic and international markets.
A leading infrastructure development company in India, primarily engaged in the construction of highways, bridges, and other transportation infrastructure projects across several states.
A leading global airport infrastructure developer and operator, managing airports in India and abroad, and involved in related infrastructure projects including energy and transportation.

companyName: Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone Limited

companyProfile.about: India's largest private port operator and an integrated logistics player, managing a network of ports and logistics assets across the Indian coastline and internationally.
A leading infrastructure development and engineering company in India, primarily focused on the construction of roads, highways, bridges, and other transportation infrastructure projects.
